activity.title: "Quick Data Display"
activity.description: Quick display of data for debugging purposes.

activity.title: "SCEPP Day Viewer"
activity.description: View an entire day's worth of data from a SCEPP station

activity.title: "Real Time Data"
activity.description: View data currently coming in from seismic stations

activity.title: "Default Configuration of the Global Earthquake Explorer"

taskconfig.name: north
taskconfig.value: Welcome to GEE. GEE operates in two fashions: Open Exploration mode, which allows you to use the program in any way you like, and through learning modules, which provide a structured way of learning about a particular topic. Below are all of the modules and open exploration. Click on the go button next to the description of the way you want to use GEE.

taskconfig.name: choices
taskconfig.value: Intro to GEE Module intro to gee description doIGEE Longitudinal and Transverse Wave Module ltw description doLTW Dectecting the Layered Earth Module dle description doDLE Exploring The Earth exploring the earth description exploring Open Exploration open exploration description doAdvanced SCEPP Day Viewer Day viewer description doDayViewer Real Time Viewer Real Time Description RealTime

task.tooltip: Choose Global Stations

taskconfig.name: taskSequence
taskconfig.value: colseisdisplay QuakeFromSCEPP ShowEvents StationsFromSCEPP TimeForEarthquakeSCEPP EditCurrentDataSet

task.name: Zoom In
task.tooltip: Click this button, then use your mouse to click on a seismogram to zoom in on the time scale

task.name: Zoom Out
task.tooltip: Click this button, then use your mouse to click on a seismogram to zoom in on the time scale

task.name: Drag Seismograms
task.tooltip: Click this button, then use your mouse to drag a seismogram left or right by holding down the mouse button

task.name: Reset Zoom
task.tooltip: Click here to reset the display to its original zoom

task.name: Clear Display
task.tooltip: Click here to clear all seismograms from your display

task.name: Plot Particle Motion
task.tooltip: Click here, then create a particle motion display by clicking on a seismogram

task.name: Tag Pick Zone
task.tooltip: Click here, then select a time region on a seismogram by holding down the mouse a dragging over the region of interest, tagged region will pop up in a separate display

task.name: Tag Particle Motion Zone
task.tooltip: Click here, then select a time region on a seismogram by holding down the mouse a dragging over the region of interest, tagged 3-component seismograms will pop up in a separate display

task.name: Query IRIS Earthquake Database
task.tooltip: Query IRIS Earthquake Database
